summary: This mod adds increased camera bob (also known as head bobbing) to running, sprinting, walking and sneaking in first person mode for a more immersive gameplay. Now with Standard, Heavy, and No Bob versions!
descriptionHtml:
[heading]RBE's Enhanced 1st Person Camera Bob[/heading]
version 1.6
[heading]UPDATE![/heading]
[color=yellow]Updated "Standard" and "Heavy" running and more immersive sprinting
NEW! Light Version: 50% less camera bob than "Standard" version (keeps vanilla sprinting)
NEW! Heavy version without FOV change when going into sprinting
Fixed sprinting stutter issue[/color]

[heading]CAUTION--[/heading]
The Light, Standard and Heavy versions of this mod add increased camera bob (also known as head bobbing) to certain aspects of the game, and may cause nausea or induce an epileptic seizure in certain individuals. Certain conditions may induce previously undetected epileptic symptoms even in persons who have no history of prior seizures or epilepsy.

If you experience any of the following symptoms while playing the game with this mod -- dizziness, altered vision, eye or muscle twitches, loss of awareness, disorientation, any involuntary movement, or convulsions -- IMMEDIATELY discontinue use and consult your physician before resuming play.

[heading]DESCRIPTION--[/heading]
This mod adds increased camera bob (also known as head bobbing) to the first person view for a more immersive gameplay. Camera bobbing is now visible when running, walking, and sneaking.

Combat mode notes:
- Unfortunately I haven't been able to figure out how to alter camera bobbing when running with a drawn weapon.
- This also means that there is a slight vertical camera movement when running with a drawn weapon in the "No Bob" version. However, it is minor and there is no horizontal sway or rotation in this version, and should therefore be fairly safe to use.

Enjoy!

[heading]VIDEO--[/heading]
Video by El Sopa
[youtube]ktwEiWAUmHc[/youtube]

[heading]COMPATIBILITY--[/heading]
The mod only contains modified animations, there shouldn't be any compatibility issues. Please feed back if you come across any issues.

[heading]INSTALLATION--[/heading]
Install with Nexus Mod Manager.

For manual installation merge the included Data folder with your Skyrim Data folder.

[heading]UNINSTALLATION--[/heading]
Uninstall with Nexus Mod Manager.

For manual uninstallation delete the following files from your
Skyrim | Data | meshes | actors | character | _1stperson | animations
folder:

mt_runforwardcamerabob.hkx
mt_sprintforward.hkx
mt_walkforwardcamerabob.hkx
sneakrun_backward.hkx
sneakrun_bckwrdleft.hkx
sneakrun_bckwrdright.hkx
sneakrun_forward.hkx
sneakrun_frwrdleft.hkx
sneakrun_frwrdright.hkx
sneakrun_left.hkx
sneakrun_right.hkx
sneakwalk_bckward.hkx
sneakwalk_bckwrdleft.hkx
sneakwalk_bckwrdright.hkx
sneakwalk_forward.hkx
sneakwalk_frwrdright.hkx
sneakwalk_fwrwrdleft.hkx
sneakwalk_left.hkx
sneakwalk_right.hkx

[heading]CHANGELOG--[/heading]
v1.6:
New "Light" version with 50% less camera bob compared to "Standard" (with original vanilla sprint)
New "Heavy" version without FOV change when going into sprinting
Fixed "Standard" sprint stutter issue
Fixed "Heavy" sprint stutter issue
Updated "Standard" and "Heavy" sprint: more vertical camera shake for increased immersion
Updated "Heavy" running: less camera bob than previous version, but a lot more consistent with Heavy sprinting

v1.5:
New "Standard" version with smoother running and increased sprinting bob
New "Heavy" version with serious head bobbing for both running and sprinting
New "No Bob" version with no camera bob in 1st person mode
Fixed no audible footstep sounds when sneaking
All animations synced with audio (running was slightly out of sync in the last version due to incorrect timing)

v1.1:
Fixed no audible footstep sounds when sprinting

-=RBE=-
author: RBE

files.name: 1 - Standard Version
files.changelogHtml:
New "Light" version with 50% less camera bob compared to "Standard" (with original vanilla sprint)
New "Heavy" version without FOV change when going into sprinting
Fixed "Standard" and "Heavy" sprint stutter issue
Updated "Standard" and "Heavy" sprint: more vertical camera shake for increased immersion
Updated "Heavy" running: less camera bob than previous version, but a lot more consistent with Heavy sprinting
